lessons.title: Strength Training Basics
lessons.author: Carlos LÃ³pez
lessons.description: A full-body approach to basic strength training techniques. This program focuses on building foundational movement patterns, improving core stability, and developing muscle control through compound exercises. Ideal for beginners looking to establish proper form before advancing to heavier loads or more complex routines.
